main.name: Manish Sondhi
main.description: I am a User Experience Designer and Full Stack React & Angular Developer
main.bio: Hi there! I am Manish! I've worked with startup and large corperations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realized my passion as becoming an UI/UX Engineer & Software Engineer.

education.description: Graduated with a great learning experience in Information Technology

work.title: UI/UX Engineer & Full Stack Software Engineer
work.description: Design, develop, test and maintain a website using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.JS, and other programming languages. Involve yourself in all aspects of design, development, and testing daily. Work with our visual designers to construct and build a website, including taking wireframes and converting them into code. Ascertain that the technical and developmental parts of your mission are properly handled. Designers will be responsible for creating and maintaining high-quality digital user experiences for the marketing team, internal and external designers, and other stakeholders. The candidate must be able to produce the enabling automated toolkits to test and deploy the systems they develop, write sophisticated code, work with cloud based environments, and deal with immutable environments.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed and maintained applications using Angular. Connected to On-Premises resources like API and Database using VPC connection. Involved in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) Phases like Requirement Analysis, Implementation and estimating the timelines for the project. Developed dynamic responsive Web Application by integrating Angular11 with Bootstrap which is further integrated with Web Services.

work.title: Teller, Customer Service Representative (CSR)
work.description: I was responsible for ensuring that client assets are protected by opening and closing accounts in compliance with established operational rules. They are also responsible for managing and maintaining client account information using the new accounts system database. The Tellers aggressively cross-sell new and existing items and services to present and future clients, and use marketing strategies to establish connections.

Quote.text: Work harder than the other person in the room no matter how hard it is get the work done and give everything you have in you toward the work you really love.
I’m not a great programmer; I’m just a good programmer with great habits.
Real programmers can write assembly code in any language.
People ignore design that ignores people.
